Business.description: Title for an app for business owners

Preview.description: Button that, if clicked, shows the end product of the app

errorAppNotFound.message: Désolé, l'application est introuvable. Souhaitez-vous revenir à votre profil?

Name.description: Label on the profile page, e.g. Name: Kate, Location: Canada

Are you sure you want to delete this mag.message: Voulez-vous vraiment supprimer cette création magnifique?
Are you sure you want to delete this mag.description: Warning on modal to delete app

The Internet fell asleep!.description: Message on Discover view when device is online

noDataInfoSub.message: Si vous désirez que les utilisateurs puissent partager des données avec vous, ajoutez à votre application un bouton Réponse et un bouton Soumettre.
noDataInfoSub.description: If you'd like to let users share data with you, try adding a Counter and a Submit button to your app.

Choosing this option will allow you to c.message: Choisir cette option vous permettra de créer votre propre application sans modèle prédéfini.

This action cannot be undone.message: Vous ne pourrez pas revenir sur cette action.
This action cannot be undone.description: Footer in warning if user wants to delete their app

Delete.description: Button for removing (deleting) a block or an app

Phone.description: Type of block - creates a button that calls a number

same as minimum number.description: place holder for Initial number field
